mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST_SAVE (user_num, post_id, board_save_time) VALUES (#{userNum}, #{postId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM POST_SAVE WHERE user_num = #{userNum} AND post_id = #{postId}
mapper.select: SELECT post_id FROM POST_SAVE WHERE user_num = #{userNum} ORDER BY board_save_time DESC
